name: Assistance to Tribally Controlled Community Colleges and Universities
objective: To provide grants for the operation and improvement of Tribal Colleges and Universities (TCUs) to insure continued and expanded educational opportunities for Indian students, and to allow for the improvement and expansion of the physical resources of such institutions.

results.description: No Current Data Available. No Information Available.
Program mission fulfilled. BIA issued approximately 12 awards in FY 2020
Indian Affairs issued 35 new awards and modifications to existing awards to 30 recipients.
Awards 75 grants to entities to complete the goals and objectives of the program.
This award funded 33 programs to assist the tribally controlled community colleges and universities.

authorizations.text: Tribally Controlled Community College Assistance Act, Public Law 95-471, 25 U.S.C. 640c - 1(c); 25 U.S.C. 1815.
